laboratory_examinations.findings: Enlarged thyroid gland with a heterogeneously hypoattenuating mass in the isthmus with multiple punctate calcifications. No pathologically enlarged lymphadenopathy or other mass. Mild biapical pleural parenchymal scarring and a few scattered calcified granulomas in the right lung.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Noted peripancreatic stranding consistent with history unchanged from CT abdomen from previous day.
